fields.summary: "Manage Tags" does not work on Image landing page.

fields.description:
To reproduce:

1) go to instance landing page.
2) select an instance
3) select "More Actions"
4) select "Create Sacling group launch configuration like this" 

No dialog appears with this selection.
fields.summary: "Create Scaling group launch configuration like this" does not work from instance landing page

comments.body:
I am getting the error:

TypeError: image is undefined
var platform = image.get('platform');

I do see the "platform" defined when I launch the instance.
Ah, I know what this is. Trivial fix. I'll get a branch and PR together.

This PR contains this and several other "regressions waiting to be found" from the same cause.
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-console/pull/140

The cause was when we officially changed to the 3 sets of images, there were some places that still referred to the "images" collection for all of the images instead of "allimages"
menu option does not come up in QA system or on testing branch of console, for AWS. Unable to test against euca due to unrelated bug, where I cannot log out of AWS and then log into Euca.
I just tested in "testing" in FF24 and it worked fine. I verified the launch config was actually created as well.

From instance landing? 

Sent from my iPad
Yes, I wasn't aware this option was available anywhere else.

I just fired up a setup in QA and tested this. It worked fine.

http://10.111.1.120/euca-qa/display_test.php?testname=alice-ui-test-new&uid=1029&prev_page=http%3A%2F%2F10.111.1.120%2Feuca-qa%2Fstart_test.php&Refresh=Refresh

I just logged in to that same machine and it is not working for me. Pic attached of no wizard showing up after menu item has been selected, and of the menu item dropped down. Nada. [~kgill] checked this on safari as well and it did not work there either.
screenshots attached showing option not working on David's new qa system.
OK. on the test machine, I saw it fail on FF and Chrome. (btw, not much point in testing with safari. Tim's written that off already)

It's odd. I don't see this error when running my proxy from testing. Can anybody confirm that this setup runs from testing?
http://10.111.1.120/euca-qa/config_file_storage/inactive/alice-ui-test-new.conf

upon further checking, it looks like the images collection wasn't populated. When I moved to images, then back to instances, it starts working. I notice "images" and "allimages" are in the list of dependencies for the instances landing page. There may be a flaw in the logic that adds "images" into "allimages". That would cause this.
It was broken for me running local proxy too, FWIW.

I notice that the instance page says it wants "allimages", but that data set isn't loaded (and I'm testing with euca). The proxy should only ignore this request for aws, so I need to dig in a little more.
I also noticed that the poll frequency for public images on Euca is maybe a bit longer than we'd like, but that's really secondary.

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-console/pull/156

Turns out, there was code that ignored the push msg for allimages because it thought this was an AWS login. Turns out this wasn't and the problem was that the app.aws.aws_account value was being set to "false", but tested for "undefined". Other places that test this value are looking for defined/undefined.
Tested in Chrome, dialog displays as expected.
No issues found with the dialog. Tested on Mac Chrome.
